review: I am so sorry I didn't buy this earlier!  I absolutely love the Fire TV Stick!
author: Shee Covarrubias

review: Easy to use, like the extension cord that's included without having to pay extra for everything else, very thoughtful.
author: Victor Chu

review: Works just like I thought it would.
author: gerry rissman

review: I bought this FTV Stick, however I find it much more sluggish than the Fire TV. I was expecting the performance to be the same, but it really isn't. Secondly, the remote is a little bit different than the one that comes with the Fire TV; this one is cheap, and harder to use as well as less responsive. I would not buy this again, as a matter of fact I will likely sell it and buy a second Fire TV
author: Teredactle

review: Works great, especially if u don't have a smart TV . Easy to install
author: Dwight Neustel

review: So far, I am really enjoying the Fire TV Stick.  The only disappointment so far, is that it was shown to include HBO Go, and I have not seen that included yet.  Other than that, it is a very great little item.
author: Karie Vigeant "Michigan Book Worm"

review: No YouTube app and it sometimes loses WiFi connectivity but other than that it's been great.
author: Tarik Harper
